documentEditor.addFirstExercise: Add your first exercise manually or from an image.

settings.title: Settings
settings.geminiApiKeyPlaceholder: Enter your Google Gemini API Key

verification.invalid: Invalid API Key or connection failed.

help.title: Help & About
help.editingText: You can edit document titles by clicking on them. Exercises can be modified using the 'Edit' button. To reorder exercises, use the up and down arrow buttons on each exercise card.
help.syntaxText: The exercise content field accepts a mix of HTML for formatting and LaTeX for mathematical notation.
help.inlineMath: For inline formulas, wrap your LaTeX with \(...\). Example:
help.displayMath: For larger, centered formulas, wrap your LaTeX with \[...\]. Example:
help.aiText: Use the 'Add from Image' button to let our AI analyze and transcribe your exercises automatically. In the upload window, you can choose to have the AI bold key terms for you.
help.aboutText: Mathify is an innovative educational platform for math teachers and students. It uses AI to analyze images of math exercises, automatically extracting content, structure, and LaTeX formulas to streamline the creation of structured mathematical documents.

imageUpload.title: Add from Images
imageUpload.uploadArea: Click to browse or drag images here
imageUpload.apiKeyMissing: API Key is missing or invalid. Please configure it in settings.
imageUpload.apiKeyNeededDescription: Please add your Google Gemini API key in the settings to enable image analysis.
